Class CameraIntegrationTest

java.lang.Object
elements.CameraIntegrationTest
public class CameraIntegrationTest
extends java.lang.Object
Testing integration between creating ray from Camera to find intersection with Geometries

    • intersectionPointsNumber

      private int intersectionPointsNumber​(int Nx, int Ny, Intersectable shape)
      calculate all intersections points of Rays that start at a Camera and go through the center of the pixels in the view plane with a geometry
      Parameters:
      Nx - number of pixels at x axis
      Ny - number of pixels at y axis
      shape - shape from geometries
      Returns:
      list of intersections points with the shape
